title: Martian Self-Reliance: Isolation versus Earth Support
author: Dr. Elena Rodriguez
back_cover_text: A compelling exploration of human adaptation and self-reliance in the harsh environment of Mars, examining the psychological and practical challenges of isolation versus maintaining connections with Earth.
storefront_publishers_note_en: Through the Korean practice of pilsa, or transcriptive meditation, explore the critical questions of Mars colonization. By handwriting these thought-provoking quotes, you absorb their weight and nuance, fostering deeper understanding of humanity's next great adventure.
